mapper.select:
select USERID,HRCODE,USERNAME,USERALIAS from BG_SYS_USER A WHERE A.VALID='1'
AND A.USERID =#{userId}

select DISTINCT( A.DEPT_ID), D.DEPTNAME from bg_yy_apply A INNER JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON A.DEPT_ID=D.DEPTID WHERE A.VALID='1' and D.VALID='1'
AND A.USE_SEAL_STATUS IN ('8','9')

select NAME, CODE from BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY where pcode = 'use_seal_status' and VAILD='1'
AND CODE IN ('8','9')
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SORT_ID)
select NAME, CODE from BG_SYS_DATADICTIONARY where pcode = 'node_type' AND PID='YYGL000003' and VAILD='1' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SORT_ID)
mapper.sql:
select A.UUID as "applyId", A.APPLY_CODE as "applyCode", A.DEPT_ID as "deptId", D.DEPTNAME as "deptName", A.APPLY_USER_ID as "applyUserId", U.USERALIAS as "applyUserName", to_char(A.USE_SEAL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "userSealDate", A.USE_SEAL_PHONE as "userSealPhone", A.USE_SEAL_REASON as "userSealReason", A.USE_SEAL_STATUS as "userSealStatus", (select name from bg_sys_datadictionary where pcode = 'use_seal_status' and code = A.USE_SEAL_STATUS) as "userSealStatusName", (select replace(wm_concat(nvl(d.name, k.use_seal_value)),',',';') useSealKind from bg_yy_kind k, (select * from bg_sys_datadictionary d where d.pcode = 'use_seal_kind' and d.vaild = '1') d where k.use_seal_kind_code = d.code(+) and k.apply_id = a.uuid and k.valid='1' ) as "userSealkindName", A.ITEM_FIRST_ID as "itemFirstId", F.FIRST_CATEGORY_NAME as "itemFirstName", A.ITEM_SECOND_ID as "itemSecondId", S.SECOND_CATEGORY_NAME as "secondCategoryName", A.APPLY_HANDLE_USER_ID as "applyHandleUserId", AU.USERALIAS as "applyHandleUserName", A.OFFICE_HANDLE_USER_ID as "officeHandleUserId", OU.USERALIAS as "officeHandleUserName", F.FIRST_CATEGORY_NAME||'-'||S.SECOND_CATEGORY_NAME as "itemName" from bg_yy_apply A LEFT JOIN BG_SYS_DEPT D ON A.DEPT_ID=D.DEPTID LEFT JOIN bg_sys_user U ON A.apply_user_id = U.userid LEFT JOIN bg_yy_item_first F ON A.ITEM_FIRST_ID = F.uuid LEFT JOIN bg_yy_item_second S ON A.item_second_id = S.uuid LEFT JOIN bg_sys_user AU ON A.APPLY_HANDLE_USER_ID = AU.userid LEFT JOIN bg_sys_user OU ON A.OFFICE_HANDLE_USER_ID = OU.userid WHERE A.VALID='1' and D.VALID='1' and U.VALID='1' AND S.VALID='1'
and A.APPLY_CODE like '%'||#{applyMap.applyCode}||'%'
and to_char(A.USE_SEAL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{applyMap.startData}
and to_char(A.USE_SEAL_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{applyMap.endData}
and A.DEPT_ID like '%'||#{applyMap.deptId}||'%'
and A.USE_SEAL_REASON like '%'||#{applyMap.useSealReason}||'%'
and A.USE_SEAL_STATUS like '%'||#{applyMap.useSealStatus}||'%'
and A.ITEM_FIRST_ID like '%'||#{applyMap.itemFirst}||'%'
and A.ITEM_SECOND_ID like '%'||#{applyMap.itemSecond}||'%'
AND A.USE_SEAL_STATUS IN ('8','9')
ORDER BY A.CREATE_TIME DESC
